document.full_text: moving to stem a furor over the brutal beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium on opening day, los angeles police pledged on thursday to deploy a "sea" of officers at the team's next home game.
document.title: l.a. officials pledge heavy security at dodgers games
lines_and_colors: moving to stem a furor over the brutal beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium on opening day, los angeles police pledged on thursday to deploy a "sea" of officers at the team's next home game.
